director.name: 扎克拉尔斯·库纳克 Zacharias Kunuk

introduction: After the groundbreaking success of Atanarjuat, Zacharias Kunuk made a series of community-focused mid-length documentaries, including this captivating profile on Inuit shamanism, co-directed with Paulossie Qulitalik. (Kunuk would later return to the subject in his stop-motion stunner Angakusajaujuq, also playing in this program.) The film blends footage of Igloolik life with stories, told by on-camera interviewees, of shamanism and the spirit world around us.
